name: Battlefield Hardline: Premium
summary:
The streets are never quiet between the cops and criminals. Keep the fantasy going through four expansion packs - and get a two week headstart for each one. Gear up with super features and battlepacks. Personalize yourself and get access to exclusive events.

Own more, be more and upgrade to a Battlefield Hardline Premium membership. You'll be styling and profiling.

The Perks:
- Two weeks early access to all four expansion packs
- Four super features including Masks and Gun Bench
- 12 Gold Battlepacks
- Access to Community Test Environment, double XP periods and other Premium-exclusive events
- New personalization options including gun camos, ammo skins, and more
- Priority position in server queues
